content:
Hi Abbey,

You have not given us much to go on.

I'm guessing that you want to become familiar with the View menu. Start by selecting View > Folders > All folders, de-selecting the other options under View > Folders, and see if that works for you.

If you are using Windows and you do not see an application menu, where "View" is, either press the <alt> key to show the menu or use the menu behind the three-lined button on the right of the unified toolbar at the top of your screen to get to "View".
creator: mozilla98
